thread.title: Nigel Farage On Piers Morgan's Life Stories Will Talk About Sex And Death
thread.title_full: Nigel Farage On Piers Morgan's Life Stories Will Talk About Sex And Death

author: Chris York
title: Nigel Farage On Piers Morgan's Life Stories Will Talk About Sex And Death
text:
Nigel Farage On Piers Morgan's Life Stories Will Talk About Sex And Death 'Make it go away.' 23/02/2017 15:05 Chris York Senior Editor, Huffington Post UK 
Friday nights - typically the preserve of after-work drinks, the first rave of the weekend or perhaps some much-needed family time. 
Well, that’s about to change. 
Forget anything you had planned for tomorrow evening because if you have a TV and a healthy disregard for the intensity of your nightmares, you can listen to Nigel Farage talk about sex. 
And death. ***TOMORROW*** — Piers Morgan (@piersmorgan) February 23, 2017 
As you’d expect, people have been mostly horrified at the thought.
